Snippet:
- name: Basic set stats testing 
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false

  vars:
    my_input: "{{ element1.var.my_var }}" #settable
    my_string_input: "Hello here we are {{ element1.var.my_var }}" #settable

  tasks:    
    - debug:
        var: my_input

    - debug:
        msg: "my_input is {{ my_input | type_debug }}"
  
    - debug:
        var: my_string_input

    - debug:
        msg: "my_string_input is {{ my_string_input | type_debug }}"
